news.title: How long Britain could really fight for if war broke out tomorrow
news.summary: In the event of a war, one expert suggests the British Army could be incapable of fighting effectively on land within weeks, once committed - though  'much depends on the form of the conflict'.

news.title: Storm Bram brings flooding and travel disruption to UK
news.summary: Amber and yellow warnings for wind are in place, with gusts of 90mph forecast in north-west Scotland.

news.title: UK asylum system hit by inefficiencies and wasted funds, watchdog finds
news.summary: In a new analysis, the National Audit Office finds “reactive” government policies moved problems elsewhere.

news.title: UK spending half an hour longer online than in pandemic, says Ofcom
news.summary: The survey found people in the UK spent on average four hours and 30 minutes online every day in 2025

news.title: Two teenagers went to seek gold. They were buried alive in a mine collapse
news.summary: Poverty in Sierra Leone is pushing more students into risky work, which proved deadly for two boys.

news.title: Big result for Slot and Liverpool with no Salah in Milan
news.summary: Liverpool win away in the Champions League without Mohamed Salah for the first time since 2009, in a big night for boss Arne Slot.
